name: places/ChIJwV017xhawokR5TL_OEDawH4
formattedAddress: 22 Park Pl #1, New York, NY 10007, USA
adrFormatAddress: 22 Park Pl #1, New York, NY 10007-2510, USA

editorialSummary.text: Modern deli with a large menu of salads & sandwiches for breakfast/lunch. Delivery  available.

originalText.text: Their sandwiches are really good. Their sushi could use some improvement. The grill station also has some pretty good food. And they have great prices for the area.

text.text: Their sandwiches are really good. Their sushi could use some improvement. The grill station also has some pretty good food. And they have great prices for the area.

originalText.text: Place has gone downhill the last several months. Very limited sushi (no brown rice). Service behind the counter has degraded. Some of the salads are not fresh (have a crust on top - yuk!). There is no more cashier in the back. Most importantly, they try to rip you off. Today I bought two items and one was $3.25 but the cashier charged me $3.50. When I told her she looked at me like I was wrong and eventually re-rang the order but I am constantly checking on them now. Not a good customer feeling nor do I have a lot of confidence in the food any longer. Too bad

originalText.text:
this place is incredible.

The Aroma when i first walk in is exactly what i desire in my breakfast locations.

the cook at the front of the store is fantastic.  each egg sandwich, omelette, or other breakfast endeavor get better each and every time.

The young ladies behind the counter are nothing short or wonderful, they are friendly and engaging.

Any day when i am feeling down, their cheerfulness helps to make the day better.

i have worked across the street from this restaurant for 3 years and rarely if ever miss a day.

PS try the muffins they are incredible.

originalText.text: One of my go to lunch spots, affordable with a big variety of options in a clean and quaint place. I highly recommend their salad section, one of the best values for lunch around downtown, and just as tasty as any of the chain places I've been to. Waits are never terribly long, even during peak hours.

text.text: One of my go to lunch spots, affordable with a big variety of options in a clean and quaint place. I highly recommend their salad section, one of the best values for lunch around downtown, and just as tasty as any of the chain places I've been to. Waits are never terribly long, even during peak hours.

originalText.text:
Great spot for breakfast or lunch!! In the mornings up front they have a great list of specials or you can just do eggs any way, on a platter or sandwich (feeling fancy? Get the avocado toast...it’s better than most in the area) Grab a cup of coffee and you’re out the door.
For lunch they have it all but you have to head to the back. You can get pastas, salads, full deli sandwiches and spreads, or a burger and fries up front.
They also have bags of chips and soda as well as candy and other breakfast bars to go.
